SKT_FIRST.name: Luster Explosion
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest current Health by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> of the target's Max Health.
description: Attacks an enemy and <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest current Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000027_1_1]</color> of the target's Max Health.

SKT_SECOND.name: Healing Prayer
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> the caster and the selected ally by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> of the target's Max Health and increases the selected ally's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

description: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> the caster and the selected ally by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000027_2_1]</color> of the target's Max Health and increases the selected ally's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000027_2_2]</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Lunar Protection
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> of the target's Max Health and grants <color=#28d9ed>Immunity</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000027_3_1]</color> of the target's Max Health and grants <color=#28d9ed>Immunity</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000027_3_2] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest Health. The amount of healing is proportional to the target's Max Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of Max Health.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest Health.
